attributes.action: Address the cost of gluten free food
attributes.additional_details: A norml loaf is £1.20. Agluen free loaf is £3.50 an half the price. Pasta is double the cost as aremost products
attributes.background: Make gluten free food such as bread the price of a normal loaf

rejection.details:
The UK Government is not directly responsible for the cost of gluten free foods, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Introduce voucher scheme: free gluten-free food for those with coeliac disease: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/658203
